textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Originally a New York City boutique specializing in heart-shaped objects, Only Hearts has expanded into the world of lingerie, crafting a sensual and thoroughly modern collection that exudes a simple, romantic style. Making pieces in the softest fabrics, with the sweetest prints and the most flattering fits, Only Hearts lingerie and apparel is the go-to label for underpinnings that are as chic as they are functional. See all Only Hearts reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
